aasiyanu kalapaye naw thatakangana atharin widhimath apadrawya bahara kirime kalamanakarana wyapruthiyak kriyathmaka karanu labana prathama awasthawa meya we.holsim lanka samagama yatathe wishesha wyapara eekakayak wana, jiyosayikal aayathanaya anugatha kara aththe, thora gath karmanthashala apadrawya piligath jathyanthara kramawedayak thula thama puththalama simenthi kamhale udun haraha parisarayata hithakamiwa bahara kirime kriyawaliya sandahayi.mema wyapruthiya wenuwen wayambaa palath parisara adhikariya saha madhyama parisara adhikariya mangin balapathra labi athi ekama aayathanaya da, jiyosayikal aayathanayayi.durabahara gowi janathawa wetha setha salasime aramunin kils supar aayathanaya thambauththegama pradeshaye elawalu ekathu kirime madhyasthanayak pihituwimata katayuthu yediya.

bo palayak situwannata atha hitha dena hamadenama bosath gunayen poshanaya wana bawa mata hondatama wishwasa yayi kalaniya rajamaha wiharadhipathi pujya mahacharya kollupitiye mahinda sangharakkhitha nahimiyo pawasuha.unwahanse mema adahas prakasha kale pamunuwila siri kariyapperuma wiharasthana bhumiye nawa bodhi ankurayak ropanaya kirime pinkamata pradhana aaradhitha himiyan washayen sahabhagi wu awasthawediya.wiharadhipathi shasthrapathi moratuwe nandasiri himiyange aaradhana anuwa janadhipathi upadeshaka bengamuwe nalaka nahimi, sapugaskanda rajamaha wiharadhipathi sinadi siwkorale pradhana sanghanayaka daranagama nyanasiri nahimi, wilahena aanandarama wiharadhipathi walgama aananda nahimi athulu aasanna wiharadhipathi himiwarun saha aapada kalamanakarana niyojya amathi dulip wijesekara, parlimenthu manthri ruwan wijewardhana, kalashuri wishishta rangana shilpi sathishchandra edirisinha saha palath sabha, pradehiya sabha niyojithayo da, wiharasthanaya sandaha bhumiya puja kala jayantha kariyapperuma athulu dayakayan wishala pirisak da meyata sahabhagi wuha.nahimiyo mese da kiha.lokaye paranima wrukshaya lesa handunagath shri maha bodhiye akhandawa ankura lesa wadena bo pala laksha gananak bauddhayinge wandanamanaya sandaha ropanaya kara thibenawa.pradhanama hethuwa thamayi bodhi wandanawen anantha wu budu guna menehiwimath, aarakshaka dewi dewathawunge pihita labimath pudumakara lesa asamanya balayakin bathimathunge kayika, manasika rogawalata bodhi puja ha ee wenuwen kerena bharaharawalin prathipala labima, bodhiye aparimitha balaya dakinna, awabodha karaganna kalaniye bodhin wahanse yatata ena laksha ganan janathawata haki wi thibenawa.kalaniye rajamaha wiharadhipathi mahacharya mahinda sangharakkhitha nahimi, janadhipathi upadeshaka pujya bengamuwe nalaka nahimipanan wahansela wetha wiharadhipathi shasthrapathi moratuwe nandasiri himiyan wisin hisin wadama kota bhara dun bodhi ankuraya ropanaya karaddi dahas sankhyatha bathimathun sadhukara dunha.
